resources.string: Copy your kitty: Learn to do stretching exercises when you wake up. It boosts circulation and digestion, and eases back pain.

Load up on vitamin C.We need at least 90 mg of vitamin C per day and the best way to get this is by eating at least five servings of fresh fruit and vegetables every day. So hit the oranges and guavas!
An apple a day keeps the doctor away
Reject foods and drinks made of artificial colors or sweetener
Increase your fiber intake. Eat foods with bright rich colors.
Monday: Have complete fruits for all the 3 meal for the first day
Tuesday: Have a moderate breakfast which includes cereas, soup and salad for lunch and cereals for the dinner
Wednesday: Have a combination of cereals and carbohydrates for breakfast and lunch and soup for dinner
Thursday: Have fruits for breakfast, considerable quantity of fish along with salad for lunch and wheat bread for dinner
Friday: Have a combination of cereals and carbohydrates for breakfast and lunch and soup for dinner
Saturday: Have a moderate breakfast which includes cereas, soup and salad for lunch and cereals for the dinner
Sunday: The choics is yours provided you dont take much fatty intake :)
